00022 /**
00023 * @file   apt-cel-transformer.cpp
00024 * @author Chuck Sugnet
00025 * @date   Wed Jan 25 17:38:29 2006
00026 * 
00027 * @brief Program to generically transform cel file data using
00028 * chipstreams and write the data to a new cel file. Also serves as relatively simple
00029 * code sample to illustrate usage of chipstream code.
00030 * 
00031 * 
00032 */
00033 
00034 //
00035 #include "chipstream/EngineUtil.h"
00036 #include "chipstream/apt-cel-transformer/CELTransformerEngine.h"
00037 #include "util/AptVersionInfo.h"
00038 #include "util/Fs.h"
00039 #include "util/LogStream.h"
00040 #include "util/Util.h"
00041 //
00042 #include <iostream>
00043 #include <string>
00044 
00045 using namespace affx;
00046 using namespace std;
00047 
00048 /** Everbody's favorite function... */
00049 int main(int argc, const char *argv[]) {
00050         ofstream  logOut;
00051         LogStream log;
00052         try {
00053                 CELTransformerEngine engine;
00054                 engine.parseArgv(argv);
00055 
00056                 const string version = AptVersionInfo::version();
00057                 const string cvsId = AptVersionInfo::cvsId();
00058                 const string versionToReport = AptVersionInfo::versionToReport();
00059                 const string execGuid = affxutil::Guid::GenerateNewGuid();
00060 
00061                 Verbose::setLevel(engine.getOptInt("verbose"));
00062                 const string progName = Fs::basename(engine.getProgName());
00063                 engine.setOpt("command-line",engine.commandLine());
00064                 engine.setOpt("program-name",progName);
00065                 engine.setOpt("program-company","Affymetrix");
00066                 engine.setOpt("program-version",version);
00067                 engine.setOpt("program-cvs-id",cvsId);
00068                 engine.setOpt("version-to-report",versionToReport);
00069                 engine.setOpt("exec-guid",execGuid);
00070                 if(argc == 1) { engine.setOpt("help","true"); }
00071 
00072                 // Check Options. Will print out version/help if requested then exit.
00073                 engine.checkOptions();
00074 
00075                 // Set up the logging and message handlers.
00076                 engine.openStandardLog("apt-cel-transformer.log",logOut,log);
00077 
00078                 // Run the engine. Will exit with non-zero exit statis if fails.
00079                 engine.run();
00080 
00081                 return 0;
00082         }
00083         catch(...) {
00084                 Verbose::out(1,"Unexpected Error: uncaught exception.");
00085                 // Close log files
00086                 logOut.close();
00087                 return 1;
00088         }
00089         // Close log files
00090         logOut.close();
00091         return 0;
00092 }
